data.name: Walk on Arrow Demo
data.detailed_description:
About this game

Walk on Arrow is an innovative hybrid of archery and complete freedom of movement only possible in VR! Hide, trace and fight! Using your bow and arrow to beat all of your opponents and become the one stand at last.

Features:

A Whole New Approach to Moving!
You can walk on your arrow! Every time you shoot a hook-claw arrow, your character will move in a tie with the arrow, and you can shoot another hook-claw arrow when you are in the air! Enjoy the fluency and nausea-free moving experience!

Unique Weapons
Short Bow, Scatter Bow, Repeating Bow, Sniper Bow, Composite Bow. Choose your favorite bow and shoot your opponent out!

Airdrop/Radar
Airdrop/Radar tied with a balloon will appear periodically. You can get powerful weapons from the air-drop. If you stand near the radar for a while, it will burst off an EMP shockwave revealing all other player’s trace.

Powerful special arrow
You can get Boom arrow or Frozen arrow from the air-drop. When Boom arrow landed in the target or ground, it will make an explosion damaging players nearby. When Frozen arrow landed in the target or ground, it will freeze players nearby.

Customized your avatar and weapon
Want to become a cool guy? You can wear a leather jacket and Ray-Ban glasses to become the terminator! Want to become funny? You can wear a hen hat and Koke-Kokko during the game! You can also change your bow, your arrow shaft, and your arrow tail's appearance.

Game Mode
  • Battle Royale(Single Player)
    In this mode, you will match nine other players. Your goal is to beat them all and be the last-standing one.
  • Battle Royale(Double Player)
    In this mode, you and another player will make a team. Your goal is to beat the other four teams(each made of two players) and be the last-standing team.
  • War Mode
    In this mode, you will match 9 other players, when you or other players being killed, you or other players will revive in a short time. Your goal is to kill as many players as you can before the match ends.
  • Boom Mode
    In this mode, you will match 9 other players,you can only shoot boom arrows,Use the shockwave of the arrow to send the enemy flying and kill them.
  • Guardian Mode
    In this mode, you or your team will be sent to a arena located in a desert. Your goal is to protect the energy crystal and kill as many alien invaders as possible.
Each support up to 10 players play together.

data.short_description: WOA is a multiplayer archery game with quick move method and has several modes for you to play, such as Battle-Royale, Tower Defense and so on. If you are an archery fan or has a great passion for multiplayer VR game, then WOA is a must have for you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 AMD Radeon R9 290 (equivalent or better)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 AMD Radeon RX 480 (equivalent or better)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
